label: A3B4C_oP16_31_ab_2ab_a-002
title: $\beta$-Li$_{3}$PO$_{4}$ Structure
comments: Li$_{3}$PO$_{4}$ exists in three known phases (Popovi\'{c}, 2003): \begin{itemize} \item $\alpha$-Li$_{3}$PO$_{4}$, stable from $1170^{\circ}$C to the melting point at 1220$^{\circ}$C, has an uncertain crystal structure. \item $\beta$-Li$_{3}$PO$_{4}$ (this structure) is the ground state and is stable up to 500$^{\circ}$. \item \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C4D_oP32_62_c_d_2cd_c-001}{$\gamma$-Li$_{3}$PO$_{4}$ (Li$_{2}$CdSiO$_{4}$ structure)} is the intermediate phase, and is metastable at room temperature. \end{itemize}
